sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; export default function Rating(props) { return !props.value ? ( ) : ( = 1 ? 'fa fa-star' : props.value >= 0.5 ? 'fa fa-star-half-o' : 'fa fa-star-o'}> = 2 ?
